gallery.title: Pokémon Gallery
gallery.loading: Loading data from the server, this can take a while...
gallery.notLoadedDescription: Please wait for the data to be downloaded before you move on
gallery.noLocationDescription: Please wait for the location to be loaded. If you denied location access, please manually enable it in your app settings!

locations.title: Pokémon Spawns
locations.noAccess: You need location access to use the map, please enable it in your app settings!

locations.libraryDenied: You need media library access for this feature, please enable it in your app settings!
locations.locationLoadingMessage: The app is still busy retrieving your current location, have a little patience!
locations.outOfReachMessage: You are not within 50 meters of this Pokémon, move closer!
locations.pokemonClickMessage: Select the action you would like to take

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearAreYouSure: Are you sure? All your personal data will be removed.

closeByPokemon.title: Pokemon are close to you!
closeByPokemon.description: Hurry up, the following Pokémon are ready to show their shiny potential

offline.title: You are offline!
offline.map: You are currently offline so unable to use the map, try again when your internet connection is back up
